books.title: The White Tiger
books.author: Aravind Adiga
books.summary: A dark and gripping tale about a poor Indian driver who rises to become a wealthy entrepreneur by committing a crime.

books.title: The Palace of Illusions
books.author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni
books.summary: A retelling of the epic Mahabharata from the perspective of Draupadi, one of its central characters.
related_book_suggestions_images: The Secret of the Blue Glass

books.title: 2 States: The Story of My Marriage
books.author: Chetan Bhagat
books.summary: A story about a couple from two different states of India trying to overcome cultural differences to make their relationship work.

books.title: The God of Small Things
books.author: Arundhati Roy
books.summary: Set in Kerala, this novel explores the lives of fraternal twins and the complexities of family relationships in a divided society.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice in Bollywood
books.author: Rupali Gupta
books.summary: A fun contemporary romance novel that follows the life of a modern Indian girl inspired by the iconic classic 'Pride and Prejudice'.

books.title: The Immortals of Meluha
books.author: Amish Tripathi
books.summary: A retelling of the legend of Lord Shiva in an epic fantasy adventure, exploring his origins and his rise to power.

books.title: A Fine Balance
books.author: Rohinton Mistry
books.summary: A tale of four lives intertwined during the political turmoil of India in the 1970s, filled with warmth and tragedy.

books.title: The Shiva Trilogy
books.author: Amish Tripathi
books.summary: A series of books based on the life and journey of Shiva, the legendary figure of Indian mythology, set in a fictional world.

books.title: The Cuckoo's Calling
books.author: Robert Galbraith
books.summary: A private investigator named Cormoran Strike solves the mystery behind a supermodel's suicide in this thrilling detective novel.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.summary: A philosophical novel about the journey of a shepherd named Santiago, who travels in search of treasure and finds much more than he expected.

books.title: The Space Between Us
books.author: Thrity Umrigar
books.summary: A compelling story of love, class, and cultural differences set against the backdrop of contemporary India.

books.title: Sons of the Soil
books.author: Pradeep Magazine
books.summary: An in-depth exploration of the Indian cricket team’s psyche and the growing influence of cricket in India's modern culture.

books.title: The Secret of the Nagas
books.author: Amish Tripathi
books.summary: The second book in the Shiva Trilogy, continuing the quest of Shiva to uncover the truth about the Nagas, a mythical and ancient race.

books.title: Asterix in India
books.author: René Goscinny
books.summary: A fun comic series that follows the adventures of Asterix and his tribe as they travel to India in search of a medicinal herb.

books.title: The Four-Hour Workweek
books.author: Tim Ferriss
books.summary: Tim Ferriss presents an unconventional way of working and living to help you design the lifestyle you desire.

books.title: Sita: Warrior of Mithila
books.author: Amish Tripathi
books.summary: A retelling of the Ramayana from the perspective of Sita, highlighting her strength, courage, and wisdom.

books.title: The Last Lecture
books.author: Randy Pausch
books.summary: A moving and inspiring account of Randy Pausch's lecture, sharing lessons on achieving childhood dreams and living life to the fullest.

books.title: The Girl with the Louding Voice
books.author: Abi Daré
books.summary: A powerful and inspiring story about a young Nigerian girl who strives to find her voice and fight for her rights in a patriarchal society.
